long_description: Suited for liquid adventures that take you from raging rapids to afternoon floats, the men's Keen Class 6 Watersport Sandals protect your feet while stay securely fastened. Protective polyurethane uppers are tough, lightweight and don't absorb water; microfiber tongues are soft against skin and add flexibility. Rip-and-stick adjustable heel straps plus instep drawcord ensure a snug fit. EVA footbeds with AEGIS(TM) odor-resistant linings deliver cushioning; polyurethane midsoles provide support for long days on your feet. Sticky rubber outsoles on the Keen Class 6 Watersport Sandals feature lugs designed to offer excellent traction on wet or dry ground.
short_description: Suited for liquid adventures that take you from raging rapids to afternoon floats, the men's Keen Class 6 Watersport Sandals protect your feet while stay securely fastened.
